Body: response = self.client.get(url_for('.index', sort=['name'])) assert '' in response.data assert 'Name' in response.data assert '' in response.data response = self.client.get(url_for('.index', sort=['-name'])) assert '' in response.data assert 'Name' in response.data assert '' in response.data response = self.client.get(url_for('.index', sort=['name', 'age'])) assert response.data.count('') == 1
